column4: Description
Shield hits to push link onto the ledge, somehow allowing the fire wall to bypass him without hurting him
Use a well timed Epona slide to bypass the fire wall

I found out you can die while using Ooccoo. The instakill from Hylia bridge fire will kill you right as event flag switches. So you can die either right after saying yes to warp or right after warping. Can also be used to chain Ooccoos, but this crashes. Supposedly can be used to get map glitch too.
Clip through the Lanaryu gate as Wolf Link or with Epona
Enter the LakeBed Temple early
Game-over death in the Plumm Mini-Game
Kill Kargorak while getting grabbed and remain grabbed forever
Lure the Kargarok into water to kill it instantly (but be careful of the crash that happens if grabbed while underwater)
For some reason the game softlocked on the Kargorak quick kill. Unclear why.

? Unsure of steps taken. Claims to have 'Happened by jump slashing through the air after leaving town in sky through cannon', and ended up with a frozen animation in the water, but could still pull clawshot, equip iron boots (without sinking!)
Declining to repair the cannon on french versions of the game causes the cannon to repair automatically.

column2: Flight-By-Fowl for Free / Lake Hylia OOB
column4: Perform a glitchy ledge grab to get OOB and play the Flight-By-Fowl mini-game for free.
Slash into a wall at a specific spot, allowing Link to clip through. Much harder on SD due to sword recoil
Talk to Falbi, and have him push you off the ledge. Link will continue to fall during the dialogue, eventually falling off the bottom of the map.
By transforming in a precise location to keep Fyer in line of sight then howling frame perfectly, the howl hud will come up before Plumm has the chance to force his dialogue on us.
By jumping over the cutscene trigger, and climbing in just the right spot from the water, the howl grass can be interacted with before the Plumm cutscene starts, skipping it.
When the bug boss is on its back, there is no water underneath it, so Link can fall to the bottom.

column2: Bug Boss Midna Dive => Early Lakebed Temple
column4: Midna dive being pushed by boss bug, then use that to get into Lakebed Temple Early
Just a variant of cutscene diving, but fully cont
Look away from the boss at all times while it is swimming, and it will continue to drift lower and lower underwater.
Fall off a wooden platform while carrying a box. Sometimes this can cause the wood platform to infinitely fly upwards.
Not technically a glitch. Manipulate the bug boss in such a way that Link can damage him twice in one cycle.
Clip into the wall while hanging over the terrain edge. Does not allow for an OOB since Link pulls himself up.
Enter the map from the boat event, then clip out of bounds, transform into Wolf Link, and void. The game will now softlock on the map entrance cutscene.
Clip out of bounds and void out in certain locations during the Wagon escort, and a failsafe game mechanism will trigger. This skips the King Bulbin fight, and gives Link the small key.
? Clipped into the floor during "Wolf/Bomb" strat. No footage of setup.
Kill King Bulbin 2 on the same frame he hits you. This causes a softlock on the Small Key obtained dialog.

Dupe the last item Link obtained by obtaining Text Displacement and speaking to Auru from afar. This only works after having previously interrupted Auru's text. HD only due to increased dialogue range. Can be used to obtain an overworld Ooccoo Senior, which is extremely glitchy. Can also be used to obtain the most recent item obtained in a different save file.
Clip into the fence and go OOB
[Cross-post] See General tab for details.
[Cross-post from unsolved glitches] When grabbing a 2nd Poe, Link somehow warped off screen and the game softlocked.
Enter this area early after performing Faron Escape in Twilight (? any other info?)
Trigger this cutscene as human Link after performing Early Master Sword, and the animations will be severely glitched.
Use Map Glitch + Door Storage to reduce Link's hitbox to allow him to clip through a wall and obtain the 100 rupee with only the clawshot.
Access Snowpeak earlier than intended
Get onto the edge of the map. Used in Earliest SnowPeak.
Dupe fishing rods and catch fish underwater to clip underneath the map and swim out of bounds.
Some underwater areas are not considered underwater, allowing use of items
[Cross-Post] See notes in the Death Mountain section of the Eldin tab for details.
Rescue the Goron using normal bombs (ie not water bombs)

column2: Steal Lent Bomb Bag / Black Rupee
column4: Use an Ooccoo (or Wolf Link) to escape the Iza Mini-game

column2: Infinite Bomb Arrows on New File
column4: Escape Iza Minigame, then perform a BiT save. The new file will have infinite bombs/arrows.
Glitch the Plumm/Iza Mini-games resulting in infinite bombs/arrows
Using Boomerang and precise positioning, a bomb can be guided into the rocks, eliminating the need for arrows to start the event.
Store a static global flag indicating Hena is mad at you, and her dialog will play on other files
? Steps unclear, happened on Wii

column2: Fishing Hole - Fish out of Water
column4: I guess you can drop fish or something and they bounce around on land forever
Win the marble mini-game by hitting the victory trigger from slightly "out of bounds".
Bonking while collecting the final bug queues the tear to be collected the next time you enter the zone. Saying 'No' and leaving would leave it uncollected.
Go fast, ignoring the first bug on the Kargarok, and it will eventually catch up allowing Link to kill it later.
Repeatedly doing the infinite bomb arrows glitch results in this invalid position axis time after time. Exact steps are unclear.
Walking into the lakebed temple gate at various angles in the left corner can clip Link through eventually
Drop the helmasaur shell while stepping up in a precise location to get pushed out of bounds. Can be used to access a chest early.
Fight Deku Toad early by setting the Boss Flag
Side hopping, and sometimes jump slashing, onto the grate in the Deku Toad room can sometimes clip through the floor with the right speed and angle.
? Swim underneath the water once it is flowing maybe?
Quickly drop down after clawshotting within a 2 frame window to skip needing to lower down into the hole
OOB Navigation to enter Morpheel's room early

Shoot the tentacle with a clawshot on the same frame the intro cs tries to start. This cancels the cs and starts a glitchy phase 1 with weird tentacles, broken boss attacks, and no music. No air refill, so without Zora armor Link drowns.
Defeat Morpheel only using Iron Boots, Clawshot, and Water Bombs
Stalactites pushed by water jets slowly drift out of bounds. Wii Only?
Perform vine clipping to get out of bounds in the left (right on Wii) stalactite room

column2: TODO: All vine clip OOBs. Worth including any that are possible.

column4: Not a glitch. Just some TAS strats for hitting stalactites without aiming.
Somehow Chus can be baited into the wall in the entrance room.
Clip through the wheel using a Wolf Link transform

column2: Fish Fly Climb: West Supply Room
column4: Use the Amazing Fly Glitch using a caught fish + rod duping to climb without claw shot.
Long Jump Attack to get out of bounds at the top of the mountain.
Side hop immediately after closing the piece of heart obtained dialog after completing the 2nd race, and save/quit/reload mid air.
Use map glitch to disable loading zones, then progress up Snowpeak Mountain. Cancel the map-glitch effect by using a Howling Stone, and continue as normal.
Access Snowpeak Ruins early using a superjump to get passed the triggers that prevent Link from progressing.
Two frame perfect A/B presses to use UMD to bring the m
LJA to jump around a trigger that causes Midna text to appear before entering Snowpeak Ruins.
Shoot a clawshot through the breakable floor due to missing hitbox or something
Have a non-zero boss flag
Skip the wall with an insanely precise wolfos aggro and superjump over the wall
Transform behind the Freezard to gain access to the door without killing it.
Clip through the ice wall

column2: Transform Ice Wall / Regular Wall Clip
column4: Clip through the regular wall when attempting ice wall clip
Enter his room from the wrong side before talking to yeta or you enter while having the pumpkin etc without having talked to him first
? Steps unknown
LJA over the void, collect the heart piece.
Using bomb boosts and LJAs, it is possible to skip the Freezard by the ladder on the upper floor outside.
Using well timed ladder drops, it is possible to skip the Freezard by the ladder on the upper floor outside. Hilariously, this is not technically a glitch.
Equipping Iron Boots on Wii and opening the locked door on the 2nd floor where the cracked floor is.
Jumping (slash, sidehop, etc) into a ledge in the initial hallway can sometimes cause a crush void.
